Package game.items

Class RuneManager

java.lang.Object
game.items.RuneManager
public class RuneManager
extends java.lang.Object
Manages runes and the actors who hold them
Author:
Gunnraj Dhaliwal Modified by: Behnam Mozafari

    • getInstance

      public static RuneManager getInstance()
      method to get instance of a RuneManager. Follows the singleton pattern
      Returns:
      instance of the RuneManager

    • registerActorRunes

      public void registerActorRunes​(Actor actor, Runes runes)
      Allows the adding of actors and their runes into the RuneManager
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor who is having their runes registered
      runes - The actor's runes getting registered

    • removeActorRunes

      public void removeActorRunes​(Actor actor)
      removes actor and their runes from the RuneManager
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor being de - registered

    • addToActorRunes

      public void addToActorRunes​(Actor actor, int amount)

    • removeFromActorRunes

      public void removeFromActorRunes​(Actor actor, int amount) throws java.lang.Exception
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • getActorRunes

      public Runes getActorRunes​(Actor actor)
      Allows for access into the specified actor's runes
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor whose runes you want to access
      Returns:
      the runes belonging to the parameter actor

    • transferRunes

      public void transferRunes​(Actor giver, Actor receiver)
      Transfers all runes from giver actor to receiver actor, removes receiver from runeTable
      Parameters:
      giver - actor to give runes
      receiver - actor to receive runes

    • setDroppedFromPlayerDeathRunes

      public void setDroppedFromPlayerDeathRunes​(Runes droppedFromPlayerDeathRunes)
      Sets the droppedFromPlayerDeathRunes attribute, and adds the previous droppedFromPlayerDeathRunes to the reset manager as they should be reset
      Parameters:
      droppedFromPlayerDeathRunes - The runes that were on the player that are being dropped due to death
